name: FAME- Rumble Kong League
description: $FAME is the native utility token powering the FAME Network, a cutting-edge multisport ecosystem that brings sports, gaming, and entertainment on-chain. Built to fuel multiple sports titles—including their first mobile title Rumble Kong League (RKL)—$FAME serves as the backbone of the network’s economy, enabling seamless transactions, in-game transactions, wagering, and ecosystem development. Rumble Kong League (RKL) is a fast-paced 3v3 basketball mobile game blending explosive basketball action with hooper fashion and basketball culture launching on the Ronin Blockchain. Backed by a strong group of investors and partners such as NBA Stars, Steph Curry and Paul George, CAA (Creative Artists Agency), JDS and others, RKL has already partnered with global brands in the sports industry like Gatorade, Stance, Under Armour’s Curry Brand, and SLAM Magazine, positioning the brand deep within sports culture.
